title: WANTING - T206 Cardinals low grade (ie beat to death)
author: frankhardy

posts.post_title: WANTING - T206 Cardinals low grade (ie beat to death)
posts.post_content: I am a Cardinals team set collector. I have decided to go after a T206 Cardinals team set. Anybody have any very low grade? This is kind of new because the oldest team set I have is 1948 Bowman. I eventually want to get T206, T205, Goudey, and Play Ball. Right now, I want to stick to T206. Thanks for any help.

Good luck, Shane!  Are you going for the different backs as well?

I've been (slowly) working on this set for a little under a year (I've got 10/18 with one duplicate).  I hope to finish it this year (except for the O'Hara which I will probably never be able to afford :mad:) and then move on to the T205s.  

[quote name="frankhardy" post=866264]I am a Cardinals team set collector. I have decided to go after a T206 Cardinals team set. Anybody have any very low grade? This is kind of new because the oldest team set I have is 1948 Bowman. I eventually want to get T206, T205, Goudey, and Play Ball. Right now, I want to stick to T206. Thanks for any help.[/QUOTE]

The backs don't matter to me. I am looking to get the different variations on the front (ie both Bresnahan's). 

So, you're working on a CARDINALS T206 set? Are you a Cardinals team set collector?
My main focus is '52-'85, but I've picked up some pre-war stuff for my Cardinal collection.  Good luck with it.
Have you had any luck, Shane?  How far into the set are you?
